The latest from Matthew
My constituency: Greenwich and Woolwich
I represent the parliamentary constituency of Greenwich and Woolwich (which covers parts but not all of the Royal Borough of Greenwich). The constituency is made up of the communities of Woolwich, Charlton, Greenwich and parts of Blackheath and Plumstead, each of which retain their own distinct character and community spirit.
